Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vasectomy \Vas*ec"to*my\ (v[a^]s*[e^]k"t[-o]*m[y^]), n. [Vas + -ecmoty.] (Surg.) Resection or excision of the vas deferens. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
vasectomy n : surgical procedure that removes all or part of the vas deferens (usually as a means of sterilization); is sometimes reversible
